parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the parent [[Display]] of the given control. For parent [[Control]]s group see [[ctrlParentControlsGroup]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ctrlParent]] control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Display]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_display = [[ctrlParent]] _control</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allControls]], [[allDisplays]], [[controlsGroupCtrl]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlSetModel]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]], [[displayParent]], [[ctrlParentControlsGroup]]
</value></part></template>
